org.akubraproject.rmi.remote
Interface RemoteCallListener

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Subinterfaces:
RemoteTransactionListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
ServerTransactionListener
public interface RemoteCallListener
extends Remote

A listener for calls that the server side wishes to make on the client side. This is mainly to reverse the call direction and avoid rmi-call-backs to the client from the server side. This reversal is needed to make akubra-servers work with clients that are behind firewalls or are on a NAT network.

Author:
Pradeep Krishnan

Nested Class Summary
static interface RemoteCallListener.Operation<T>
          An operation to be performed on the client side.
static class RemoteCallListener.Result<T>
          Result of an operation.
